metadata.name: Regsvr32 Execution From Highly Suspicious Location
metadata.comment: Detects execution of regsvr32 where the DLL is located in a highly suspicious locations

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\regsvr32.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('regsvr32.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\perflogs\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\registration\\crmlog')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\system32\\com\\dmp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\system32\\fxstmp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\system32\\microsoft\\crypto\\rsa\\machinekeys\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\system32\\spool\\drivers\\color\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\system32\\spool\\printers\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\system32\\spool\\servers\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\system32\\tasks_migrated\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\system32\\tasks\\microsoft\\windows\\synccenter\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\syswow64\\com\\dmp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\syswow64\\fxstmp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\syswow64\\tasks\\microsoft\\windows\\pla\\system\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\syswow64\\tasks\\microsoft\\windows\\synccenter\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\tasks\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\tracing\\')) OR (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' "c:\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' c:\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' \'c:\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('d:\\'))) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\program files (x86)\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\program files\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\programdata\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\users\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' c:\\windows\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' "c:\\windows\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' \'c:\\windows\\')))) AND NOT (lower(process.cmd_line) = lower('') OR process.cmd_line is null))

output.summary: Detects execution of regsvr32 where the DLL is located in a highly suspicious locations

metadata.objective: False positive: Unlikely Reference: Internal Research
